title: SB 1.19.32| HH Stoka Krishna Swami | 30-05-2023 | Daily Evening Bhagavatam Discourse
speaker: HH Stoka Krishna Swami

segments.key_quote: The appearance of Shukadeva Goswami was certainly a very very divine event that he was sent by Krishna.
segments.summary: This segment introduces the context of the lecture, focusing on the meeting of Shukadeva Goswami and Pariksit Maharaj, and highlighting Shukadeva Goswami's exalted position and divine nature.

segments.key_quote: It is more abominable than drinking poison willingly. That means, it is very very dangerous. It is a big big big obstacle for spiritual advancement.
segments.summary: This segment discusses the principle of detachment from worldly enjoyers and women for serious transcendentalists, using the example of Chaitanya Mahaprabhu refusing to meet King Pratap Rudra and quoting a verse emphasizing the danger of associating with materialistic individuals.

segments.key_quote: So I am very, very, very, very fortunate and blessed by Shukade Goswami.
segments.summary: This segment explains Parikshit Maharaj's humility and gratitude towards Shukadeva Goswami for accepting his respects and agreeing to instruct him, highlighting the fortune of receiving guidance from a pure devotee.

segments.key_quote: It is more abominable than drinking poison willingly. That means, it is very very dangerous. It is a big big big obstacle for spiritual advancement.
segments.summary: This segment reiterates the principle of detachment from worldly enjoyers and women for serious transcendentalists, using the example of Chaitanya Mahaprabhu refusing to meet King Pratap Rudra and quoting a verse emphasizing the danger of associating with materialistic individuals.
